scripts.start:reset: npm run clean:runtime && npm run start -- --reset-cache
scripts.bundle: yarn clean; npm run bundle:android && npm run bundle:ios && npm run genstrings
scripts.bundle:android: mkdir -p bundle/android && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file ./index.js --assets-dest ./bundle/android --bundle-output ./bundle/android/App.js --sourcemap-output ./bundle/android/App.js.map
scripts.bundle:ios: mkdir -p bundle/ios && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file ./index.js --assets-dest ./bundle/ios --bundle-output ./bundle/ios/App.js --sourcemap-output ./bundle/ios/App.js.map
scripts.install:wpcli: (test -x bin/wp-cli.phar || curl -Ls https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wp-cli/builds/gh-pages/phar/wp-cli.phar -o bin/wp-cli.phar && chmod +x bin/wp-cli.phar) && bin/wp-cli.phar --info
scripts.makepot:android: npm run wp i18n make-pot ./gutenberg/packages --include=*.native.js,*.android.js --exclude=test/* --subtract=./gutenberg.pot --ignore-domain gutenberg-android.pot
scripts.makepot:ios: npm run wp i18n make-pot ./gutenberg/packages --include=*.native.js,*.ios.js --exclude=test/* --subtract=./gutenberg.pot --ignore-domain gutenberg-ios.pot
scripts.premakepot:gutenberg: npm run clean:gutenberg && npm run build:gutenberg
scripts.makepot:gutenberg: npm run wp i18n make-pot ./gutenberg/build --ignore-domain gutenberg.pot
scripts.genstrings: npm run genstrings:android && npm run genstrings:ios
scripts.wpandroid: npm run android -- --root $TMPDIR/gbmobile-wpandroidfakernroot --variant wasabiDebug --appIdSuffix beta --appFolder WordPress --main-activity=ui.WPLaunchActivity
scripts.test:e2e:bundle:android: mkdir -p gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/android/app/src/main/assets && react-native bundle --reset-cache --platform android --dev false --minify false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/android/app/src/main/res
scripts.test:e2e:build-app:android: npm run test:e2e:bundle:android && cd gutenberg/packages/react-native-editor/android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.prettier:check:
prettier-eslint --list-different $npm_package_config_jsfiles $npm_package_config_scssfiles || { echo '
ERROR: `yarn prettier:check` found a formatting problem.
No files have been changed. Try running `yarn prettier` to fix any formatting issues.
'; exit 1; }
scripts.build:gutenberg: cd gutenberg && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.clean: yarn clean:build-artifacts; yarn clean:aztec; yarn cache clean; yarn clean:haste; yarn clean:jest; yarn clean:metro; yarn clean:react; yarn clean:watchman; yarn clean:node; yarn clean:pot
scripts.clean:runtime: yarn clean:haste; yarn clean:react; yarn clean:metro; yarn clean:jest; yarn clean:watchman; yarn clean:babel-cache
scripts.clean:aztec: cd ../react-native-aztec && npm run clean && cd example && npm run clean
scripts.version: npm run bundle && git add -A bundle
